mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, BATH_NO, UNIT_NAME, SUB_ORGAN, QUERY_USER_ID, QUERY_COUNT, RECEIVE_TIME, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{batchNo}, #{unitName}, #{subOrgan}, #{queryUserId}, #{queryCount}, #{receiveTime}, #{appId} )
